abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Education Sector
            Investment Project for Eritrea is to increased and more
            equitable enrolment in basic education and enhanced quality
            in basic and secondary education. The extension is necessary
            to ensure that critical activities financed not only by the
            International Development Association (IDA) credit but also
            by the European Commission Trust Fund (ECTF) can be
            completed in an orderly manner. Failure to process the
            proposed six-month extension will jeopardize achievement of
            the project objective of 'increased and more equitable
            enrollment' as well as 'enhanced quality in
            elementary and secondary education'. There are no
            changes to the project design, its objectives, or financing mechanisms.
